## Importing packages
```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

## Load Dataset

```{r}
train <- read.csv('train.csv')
```

# Processing Data

```{r}
pop_nat <- train %>%
  mutate(kor = .[[92]]/.[[82]]) %>%
  mutate(viet = .[[94]]/.[[82]]) %>%
  mutate(asianOther = .[[96]]/.[[82]]) %>%
  mutate(natHawaii = .[[100]]/.[[98]]) %>%
  mutate(natCha = .[[102]]/.[[98]]) %>%
  mutate(natSamoan = .[[104]]/.[[98]]) %>%
  mutate(natOther = .[[106]]/.[[98]]) %>%
  mutate(raceOther = .[[108]]/.[[66]]) %>%
  mutate(twoBlack = .[[112]]/.[[110]]) %>%
  mutate(twoNative = .[[114]]/.[[110]]) %>%
  mutate(twoAsian = .[[116]]/.[[110]]) %>%
  mutate(twoBlackNative = .[[118]]/.[[110]]) %>%
  mutate(twoOther = 1 - twoBlack - twoNative - twoAsian - twoBlackNative) %>% 
  select(kor, viet, asianOther, natHawaii, natCha, natSamoan,
         natOther, raceOther, twoBlack, twoNative, twoAsian, twoBlackNative, twoOther)
```
